play.title: Play
play.input-id-desc: Enter the ID of the chart you want to play.
play.input-id-desc2: You can also play by accessing the chart URL (<url></url>).
play.input-direct: Enter Chart ID and go to play screen directly
play.input-direct-devonly: dev environment only, instead of /share/cid path
play.latest-desc: List of charts recently created or updated.
play.latest-desc2: For chart creators: Check 'Make public' in chart editor to reflect here after a few minutes.
play.sample-desc: Charts created by Falling Nikochan author <small>(na-trium-144)</small>. Start here if you are new.
play.sample-desc2: Also, more charts are available on Falling Nikochan's YouTube channel <youtube>@nikochan144</youtube>.

edit.title: Chart Editor
edit.welcome: Welcome to Falling Nikochan chart editor. You can create charts without an account.
edit.input-id-desc: Enter the ID of the chart you want to edit. Password is required after entering ID.
edit.new-desc: You can save a chart to the server once every {rateLimitMin} minutes. (You can overwrite a chart as many times as you want.)
